Docker


		systemctl restart docker

	
docker start

		sudo su
		
		
from image

			docker image list
			docker run -it --name ubuntu-network-1 ubuntu-network
		
			
with a mount

				docker run -v .:/rollercoaster -it --name ubuntu-rollercoaster ubuntu-network:v1
			
		
		
from container

			docker container ls --all
			f"docker restart { container_id }"
			f"docker exec -it { container_id } /bin/bash"
			
				#
				#	docker restart cd55e3c71e0b; docker exec -it cd55e3c71e0b /bin/bash
